newsitem.title: USA: Integra names McKinney corp vice chairman.
newsitem.headline: Integra names McKinney corp vice chairman.

text.p: Integra LifeSciences said on Friday that it had named George McKinney to the newly created position of corporate vice chairman, effective immediately.
McKinney, who will now be responsible for the company's product pipeline, has been a member of its board of directors since 1992, Integra said in a statement.

Prior to joining Integra, he was a managing director at Beacon Venture Management in Boston, a specialized venture partnership, and also served as president of Gel Sciences, one of Beacon's portfolio companies.
Integra LifeSciences Corp manufactures proprietary BioSmart pharmacological products.
